name: WheelofFortune
0:
”Alexa, play Wheel of Fortune”
”Spin”
”I'd like to solve the puzzle”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content. This skill can extend the  mic timeout.
Invocation Name: wheel of fortune
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Celebrate over 35 years of America’s Game®—enable the skill and play today!
 
Join the Wheelmobile on a tour across America! Use your voice or touch the screen of your Echo Show to spin and win. See if you can earn gold in all 50 states. Or play with up to three friends or family in a local Party Game. You’ll get to play like real contestant on the show and see who can make it to the Bonus Round! 

Wheel of Fortune is even better with a subscription. You can subscribe to play unlimited puzzles! 

So… Get ready to step up and spin that wheel! 

*PLEASE NOTE: Wheel of Fortune is designed for Echo Show devices. Devices without screens and non-Amazon devices are not supported at this time. 

If you have issues, questions or comments please email us at gamesupport@spe.sony.com. We want to hear directly from you!

"Wheel of Fortune®" and "America's Game®" are registered trademarks of Califon Productions, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
